alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 3:58PM CDT until October 04 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR COMANCHE...WESTERN COTTON AND EAST CENTRAL TILLMAN COUNTIES... At 358 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Indiahoma to 6 miles south of Cache to near Geronimo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Walters, Cache, Elgin, Geronimo, Sterling, Chattanooga, Randlett, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Devol, Faxon, Meers, Cookietown, Lake Lawtonka, Fort Sill, southern Lake Ellsworth, and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
